Authors: Dewi Susan, Atik Retnowati, Nampiah Sukarno
Title:
Coltriciella minuscula sp. nov., a new species of poroid
fungus on Pinus merkusii from Indonesian tropical forest
Abstract:
Coltriciella minuscula sp. nov. is described and
illustrated from a specimen collected on the pine tree Pinus merkusii
from Bogor, Indonesia. This species is characterized by very small size
of basidiocarp with long hair on the stipe and ornamented spores. Both
morphological distinctiveness and phylogenetic separation based upon
analyses of nrDNA ITS sequences support the establishment of this new
species. Anatomical dissimilarities between C. minuscula and close
species are discussed. Notes on a new record of C. aff. subglobosa, are
included.
